landing.heroDescription: [kn] Manage your personal or shared expenses effortlessly. Upload receipts, categorize spending, and visualize where your money goes - all in one beautiful app.
landing.aiReceiptDescription: [kn] Upload receipts and let AI extract the details automatically
landing.visualAnalyticsDescription: [kn] Interactive charts and filters to understand your spending
landing.sharedAccountsDescription: [kn] Track expenses together with your partner or team
landing.featuresTitle: [kn] Everything you need to manage expenses
landing.featuresSubtitle: [kn] Built with modern tools for the best experience
landing.multipleAccountsDescription: [kn] Create separate accounts for personal, household, or work expenses. Keep your finances organized.
landing.categoriesTagsDescription: [kn] Organize expenses with custom categories and tags like vacation, work, or home.
landing.multiCurrencyDescription: [kn] Track expenses in any currency with automatic conversion to your preferred currency.
landing.darkModeDescription: [kn] Easy on the eyes with full dark mode support. Switch anytime.
landing.securePrivateDescription: [kn] Your data is encrypted and protected. No password needed - just a secure magic link.
landing.mobileFriendlyDescription: [kn] Access your expenses from any device. Works beautifully on desktop and mobile.

errors.pageNotFoundDescription: [kn] The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
errors.unexpectedError: [kn] An unexpected error occurred while loading this page.
errors.errorOccurred: [kn] An error occurred while loading your {resource}.

metadata.appDescription: [kn] Track and manage your expenses with ease. Simple, beautiful expense tracking for individuals and teams.
metadata.signInDescription: [kn] Sign in to your Gold-Finger account
